unnormalised: Arrey yaar, hi AI-chi vostu itli begaan cholta, na? Mhaka ugddas asa mhunn hanvem poilem aikolem '18ant, tem Rajinikanth filma bhaxen dislem. Atam mhozo putnyo, to kitem-i AI upkoronn vapurta tachi shallechi nibondh borounk! Tannem mhaka dakhoilem, hea appan poornn Indian orthvyovsthecher ek puro lekh toyar kelo sumar 5 minttan! Ani mhojea xezarchea dhuvek, ti Python xikta ani mhunnta ti Google-ant nokri kortoli â‚¹40 lakh package gheun. Hanv azun prayatn kortam WhatsApp-an sandex porvoddo korunk thik, ani hi bhurgim AI bandhta. Tem vichitr asa, na?
normalised: Arrey yaar, hi A-I chem vostu kitli begaan cholta, na? Mhaka ugddas asa jevhna mhaka poilem aikunk mell'lle don hojar atthraant, tem Rajinikanth cinemaantlean bhair ailear bhaxen distaalen. Aata mhozo punnyo, to A-I upkaran vaparta taka schoolachem nibondh borounk! Tannem mhaka dakhoilem, hi app ek purnn Indian orthovevosthecher panch minute bhitor utponn korunk mell'lle! Ani mhojea ajubache dhuv, ti Python xikta ani mhanti tika Google-ar rupiya challis lakhacho packageacho nokri mellttli mhunn. Hanv azun WhatsApp sandesh sarko fuddem koso dhaddcho mhunn sodta, ani hi bhurgi A-I bandhta. Tem ajibat vegllem, na?
